name: WGCNA
description: Performs weighted correlation network analysis on a normalized expression matrix. Note that this does analysis does not look for differences between experimental groups. Rather, it attempts to infer groups of genes based on patterns of co-expression. Outputs from this analysis can then be tested for biological enrichment by using a GO analysis, for example. You can remove outlier samples by specifying a sample/observation set of samples you would like to keep.

expression_matrix.description: A table/matrix of normalized gene expression. Note that we cannot check that this table is normalized!
expression_matrix.name: Expressions:

network_connectivity_param.description: A parameter that controls the connectivity of the inferred gene correlation networks. By default (if blank), this is automatically chosen based on a heuristic algorithm. However, you may choose to override this parameter if it appears the chosen point was not appropriate on the first attempt.
network_connectivity_param.name: Network connectivity parameter:
